reviews.review: I think all of the Counter Strike games are very fun to play and all together good games.
I have a fetish for Office. And it's pretty bad.
Thiis game is a brilliant first person shooter
Огонь, игра без отказна как автомат калашникова! достойна внимания!

A complete remake of the original Counter-Strike using the source engine. It consists of stunning visuals, and gameplay that could be slightly challenging to newer players, but will grow on you over time and will have you drawn into how fun this game can be.
2ая часть известного всем шутера№1. На данный момент к покупке не рекомендуется, т.к. это переходный этап между классической версией игры и новой частью "Global Offensive".
THIS IS AN AMAZING GAME!!!!!!!! nothing is better than counter-strike. call of duty and battlefield ain't got nothing on this game!
Only used for gmod. Never play the actual game.
REALLY GOOD CLASSIC Game Minigames i recommend reallty takes out all of your skills in an allround
PLAYING THIS GAME IS LIKE STARTING A SMALL BUSINESS WITH YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY AND THEN HAVING A LEPRECHAUN BURN IT DOWN AND PUNCH YOU IN THE BALLS 10/10
jeux trop connu et qui le mérite super jeux trop de délire avec ses potes a prendre !!
By far the dopest dope i've ever played! #1 greatest game of all time! G.O.A.T.
Recommending this game fow who ever didn't bought it yet.
Лично для меня компромис между 1.6 и го

Veľmi dobrá hra! Odporúčam! Hrám ju pravidelne a musím povedať, že ma stále baví.
Pre mňa sú najlepšie DeathMatch & GunGame :)
бля да она самая ахуенная игра этого дисителетия кс гоу по сравнению сней сасет лалка)))
This game has come along way since it started. However, as an old school gamer it has become a game i dont particularly care to play any more.
I Highly Recommend this game, very realistic, and if you ask me a bit better then CoD. I would tell anybody who has steam to buy this game.
Excelente juego sobre todo para los que no tenemos un equipo con gran capacidad, se puede durar dias completos jugando
I love this game it has a lot of violence which i enjoy. I love the death match servers :)
Clássico das Lan House, se você não roda COD ou BF esse eh o jogo!

If you are looking for an online shooterthat takes skill and is heavily team focused, look no further. I could not recommend this game anymore. And this is coming fromsomeone who despises military shooters. BUY THIS GAME!!!
Норм игра у меня она лагает но все ровно и играю и мне нравится
Simple, puissant, le meilleur fps de tous les temps.

This is a great game but the reason you shouldn't buy this is beacause CS GO is just cheaper than this and with enhanced graphics, new weapons, GREAT weapon skins, some new maps the old maps are just ehanced with better visuals and some diffrent ways. If this is on sale go ahead and buy it, but most of the time you'd want CS GO over this.
It's worth of every single penny!

ps: i do recomend this game but not if it turns into a demo :(

Fun fps that can be played for hours on end with friends and strangers. Wide variety of levels to choose from. You can practice on bots if you wish to get in some practice before you go up against other people.
